extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    (CLST102 and CLST103) or CLST129 or CLST200 or CLST207 or CLST101, or permission of the Department.

basic.description: This survey of the material remains of early Italy will focus on the early Iron Age, Etruscan, and Roman (Regal and Republican) cultures. Each culture's art, architecture, urban patterns, and burial practices will be investigated in terms of the changing political and social conditions affecting those societies.
basic.subject: CLST
basic.title: Archaeology of the Etruscans and Early Romans
